p: The mean simulated HI for Claire under the baseline-climate ranged between 0.46 and 0.48 across the two countries, with almost no change in HI under the 2050-climate ( Fig. 2). On average, a 13% increase in HI was found for IW 2050 (HI∼0.51-0.52) compared to CL Base in the UK, but decreased by 3% (HI∼0.45-0.46) in NZ. In contrast, HI increased by 11% and 4% in IP 2050 over CL Base in the UK and NZ respectively. HI of IP 2050 improved by 7% over IW 2050 in NZ.
